title: Rito, I'm almost to 1000 wins! (is this the right place?)
body:
Basically, title.  I'm a bronze 2 scrub just about to hit his 1000th win, and I remember you used to be able to ask your friendly neighbourhood Riot-Man to queue up with you around this point, but I can't remember if it was while getting win 1000 or afterwards, or even what board I'm meant to ask this in .-.

So does this still happen? Are Rito OCE still the friendly benevolent gods they used to be?

replies.body: I think I did.  It's just "Sephyre" right?
Yeah this is the right place. I'm sure one of them will see it soon.
Do you have to ask? I've never heard of this and I'm well over 1000 wins lol
